definitions.definition: The component of hemoglobin (and other hemoproteins ) responsible for binding oxygen . It consists of an iron ion that binds oxygen and a porphyrin ring that binds the globin molecules ; one molecule binds one molecule of oxygen.

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) The component of hemoglobin (and other hemoproteins ) responsible for binding oxygen . It consists of an iron ion that binds oxygen and a porphyrin ring that binds the globin molecules ; one molecule binds one molecule of oxygen.
